service.description: Overall service configuration for Aqua Agent

name.description: Display name for the service on the DC/OS dashboard

cpus.description: CPU allocation for the Aqua Agent instance

mem.description: Memory (MB) allocation for the Aqua Agent instance

instances.description: Number of service instances to run in the cluster. A single instance will be run per node in the cluster. Normally, this number should be equal or higher than the number of nodes in the cluster.

accepted_resource_roles.description: Accepted resource role restriction for service

aqua_token.description: Token for agent communication with the gateway

restart_containers.description: Whether the Aqua agent should restart the existing Docker containers. Recommended: no

container_mode.description: Run as a container with no docker restart? (experimental)

always_pull_image.description: Always attempt to pull image before deploying

config_enabled.description: Enable use of a docker config tarball.

config_location.description: Location of file on Mesos agent nodes.  This must pre-exist.

namespaces_enabled.description: Whether user namespaces is enabled on the host. Must be set to true if so.
